title: U.S. Senate Impeachment Trial of Former President Trump (Day 2)
author: C-SPAN
description:
The Senate Impeachment Trial of Former President Trump continues with arguments from the House managers. https://www.c-span.org/video/?508741-1/impeachment-trial
